location: near World Cup Square, Pipliyahana, Indore, Madhya Pradesh 452016

dining.name: Citron - The Lounge Bar
dining.description: Our lounge in Indore is the epitome of understated sophistication, offering an intimate indoor setting perfect for unwinding. The multi-cuisine menu and carefully crafted selection of alcoholic beverages provide an indulgent experience for those seeking a refined, yet relaxed, atmosphere. The bar also features tempting happy hours, making it an ideal choice for an early evening drink or a post-dinner nightcap, all within the comfort of its chic and elegant surroundings.
